meta.title: Ban Passarelli — Italian Restaurant in Mae On, Chiang Mai | Treecoma Cannabis
meta.description: Authentic Italian restaurant in Mae On District, Chiang Mai. Handmade pizza, fresh pasta & homemade desserts. Licensed cannabis dispensary by Treecoma. Open daily 10:00–21:00, closed Tuesdays.

home.heroTitle: Authentic Italian Restaurant in Chiang Mai
home.heroSubtitle: Handmade pizza, fresh pasta, and homemade desserts — made with love by our Italian-Thai family in Mae On.
home.storyText: Born from an Italian-Thai love story, Ban Passarelli brings authentic Italian flavors to the heart of Thailand. Every pizza is hand-stretched, every sauce is homemade, and every plant is grown with care.
home.featuredSubtitle: Handmade with love, served with a smile

about.title: Our Story
about.intro: We're the Passarelli family — Italian roots, Thai heart, and a passion for good food and natural living.
about.familyText: What started as a dream became Ban Passarelli: a place where Italian tradition meets Thai warmth. Our terrace restaurant sits surrounded by greenery, with a garden where we grow our herbs and cannabis plants organically.
about.foodText: Our recipes come from generations of Italian home cooking. We make our dough fresh every day, our sauces from scratch, and our pasta by hand. No shortcuts, no compromises.
about.cannabisText: Treecoma is our cannabis brand, grown right here in our garden. We believe in organic, sustainable cultivation — no chemicals, just nature and care.

cannabis.complianceIntro: Treecoma (Tree Coma Co., Ltd.) operates under official licensing by the Thai Ministry of Public Health. Our facility in Mae On District, Chiang Mai, is fully compliant with Thailand's medical cannabis regulations.
cannabis.licenseAuthority: Issued by the Chiang Mai Provincial Public Health Office, under authority of the Ministry of Public Health
cannabis.licenseLaw: Issued under the Protection and Promotion of Traditional Thai Medicine Wisdom Act B.E. 2542
cannabis.environmentText: We use Athena Ag nutrient systems in a controlled indoor and greenhouse environment. Every stage of growth — from seedling to harvest — follows strict protocols to ensure purity, consistency, and safety. No harmful pesticides or chemical additives are used at any stage of production.
cannabis.qualityItem3: No harmful pesticides or chemical additives
cannabis.qualityItem4: Strict production protocols from seed to harvest
cannabis.qualityItem5: Compliant with Thai medical cannabis regulations
cannabis.frameworkText: Cannabis cultivation and sale in Thailand is regulated by the Ministry of Public Health under the Protection and Promotion of Traditional Thai Medicine Wisdom Act. All operators must hold valid licenses and comply with national regulations regarding production, quality control, and distribution to authorized persons.
